description:
Get rewarded for skipping the queue!

Start earning points by ordering through our App today!

With the CHAGEE App, you can:
-Order and pay digitally
-Order for self-pickup ahead of time
-Earn Points and redeem rewards at our Rewards Store
-Earn Experience to reach higher tiers for greater benefits
-Stay up to date on new launches and deals
-Locate our outlets and their operating hours

Download and enjoy welcome discounts now!
Scroll. Click. Delivered.

a Necessity, not a Luxury

You deserve the best without breaking the bank. That’s why ZUS Coffee is here to provide specialty handcrafted coffee, hand-delivered to your doorstep. Just sit back, relax and get a quality cup of coffee delivered to you with just a few taps on your phone!

Brought to you by Malaysia #1 Coffee Delivery Brand

 - 100% Arabica Coffee Beans
 - Award-Winning Coffee Plantation at Brazil
 - World’s Top 50 Best Coffee Roastery 
 - Anti-Spillage Cup Lid
 - Exceptional Coffee Delivery Experience

Download now to enjoy Buy 1 Free 1 on your first purchase! :)
Try Deliveries Vendor - same day  delivery service in 60-90 minutes exactly when you need it. Place an order and our system will find the most suitable delivery partner nearby.

Jollibee Brunei have been serving our delicious Chickenjoy, Jolly Spaghetti and Yumburgers all over the world since 1978. Have you ever wondered what it would be like to find all your favorite fast food dishes in one place? You don't have to imagine it anymore, that's our menu. And what better way to find out for yourself than to come and eat the juiciest, tastiest and crispiest fried chicken Jollibee Brunei is waiting for you!﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿
* Track your order, LIVE: No more calling to check if your order is ready or not. You can place your order and track it live on the app on the home screen, all the way from the restaurant to your doorstep, along with real-time updates. Isn’t that super cool?
* Get notified about your order status via push notifications.
* Reliable and fast, really fast: We are boringly reliable but incredibly fast at delivery. Our delivery executives work around the clock to deliver food at your doorstep in the fastest possible time
* Lots of payment options - credit/debit card, net banking, and cash on delivery
* Pre-Order - Too busy to order your food? No issues, you can pre-order and get your food delivered to your location.
* Location Picker - automatically picks your current location
* Go ahead and download our App Now!

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Make the most of your time with our newly enhanced Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf experience. Easily collect points, earn rewards, browse the menu, and order online—all with just a few taps.

Download The Coffee Bean app today to get started and enjoy special offers crafted just for you.

Welcome to the new Pizza Hut Brunei delivery and pick up ordering app.
• Select one of our value meal deals or order your favourite pizza, sides, desserts and drinks
• Keep up-to-date with our special offers and promotions
• Pay with cash or credit card
• You can order for later
• Ordering functionality for Brunei residents only

description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Delivery App for GoMamam Dispathers. Our Driver Delivery App will help your drivers to manage all of their incoming deliveries within just a few taps on the screen, your driver has to “Accept” or “Reject” any new order confirmation for its delivery assigned by the business owner & the confirmation is sent to customers via email and push notification

Welcome to the Nando's app - the ultimate destination for all PERi-PERi chicken lovers! With our app, you can order food from your favourite Nando’s and redeem free Chicken Meals from our GENEROUSLY GENEROUS Rewards Programme!​

1 visit = 1 Chilli. Wait, what is a Chilli?​
Sign up on the app and collect 1 Chilli when you spend RM30 and above. 3 Chillies = Reward and Reward = Free Chicken Meal. It’s our kind of maths and we’re killing it.​

Signing up is a breeze​
Enter your details manually or sign up via your social account for a quicker registration.​

It’s an exclusive feeling, darling​
As an Nando's app user, you'll get a first look at menu releases and exclusive offers. It's our way of making sure that you feel extra special every time you visit us.​

Save your order and dine-in​
Ooh there’s a queue at Nando’s? Be in the queue like a champ and save your order. Once you’re seated just scan the QR code on the table and use the Nando’s app to pay online immediately. ​

Or on your lucky days you can grab a seat immediately and use our app to scan the QR code, order and pay online. You’ll get your food fast and feel like an A-lister.​

Pick-up​
In a hurry? Order ahead with the Nando’s app and pick-up. No queues, no fuss - just PERi-PERi goodness on the go.

We gotta say – if you download the app now, you’re being extra hot!​

Business Application for GoMamam Vendors, check your restaurants or stores in the palm of your hand. With our Business App, no order will get missed; all the orders will be assigned and delivered on time.
Our drivers will use this app to delivery the food and other orders to the customers. They will be helped with the maps provided by Google to find the place of the customer and deliver him the order.
The app uses the maps location to allow them to move between the strees and provide them the best and faster way to reach the house of the customer.
When the order is completed, the location will be disabled.

Find and book Japan’s best local restaurants—before you go, or on the road!

Tabelog is Japan’s leading restaurant search and reservation app, with over 800,000 restaurants and 82 million user reviews.

From sushi and yakiniku, to ramen, izakaya, cafes, and sweets, or even a taste of home, Tabelog has everything you're craving. 

Search nearby options right from the app and reserve available seats instantly. 

You can also check for multilingual menus and cashless payment support before your visit.

Features for international travelers:
- Search popular lunch or dinner spots near your location, or anywhere in the country.
- Discover neighborhood ramen, restaurants and cafes loved by locals. 
- Find restaurants with open seats now and reserve immediately.
- Save favorite places for later.
- Restaurant recommendations for dates, family trips, solo-dining and group outings.

SIX reasons to choose Tabelog:
1. Over 800,000 restaurants across Japan -- Not just Tokyo and Kyoto!
2. 82+ million authentic reviews from real diners
3. 3 million registered reviewers nationwide, posting photos and reviews daily
4. Map-based search makes navigation easy
5. Online reservations with real-time seat availability
6. Save restaurants to your personal list
*Restaurant data as of May 2024, based on internal research.
 
[Recommended Operating Environment]

We recommend using the Tabelog app under the following operating environment. The app may not function properly or may not be installable on versions outside the recommended environment. Please update to the recommended OS version for the best experience.
Recommended OS: iOS 18.0 or later

*For any issues related to app operation or installation via the App Store, please contact Apple Inc. directly.
*iPhone and App Store are trademarks or registered trademarks of Apple Inc. in the U.S. and other countries.

Privacy Policy: 
https://tabelog.com/en/help/privacypolicy 

Terms of Use: 
https://tabelog.com/en/help/rules
https://tabelog.com/en/help/reservation_rules

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

Premium gives access to all the features of the application!

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!

End User Licensing Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Deals, payment, cashback, and rewards—your lifestyle companion all in one app.

Triple the rewards.

Get the (ice cream) party started. Order cakes, scoops, shakes, & more, access exclusive deals & offers, and experience Baskin-Robbins® at your fingertips. Trusted by over 4 million ice cream lovers, the Baskin-Robbins® App is here to help you sweeten every moment.
 
ORDER YOUR FAVES
Order your favorite treats – like scoops, sundaes, beverages, and more. Customize with your favorite flavors & place your order right in the App.
 
ACCESS SWEET DEALS
Exclusive access to the latest & greatest updates, coupons, and deals.
 
CELEBRATE MORE EVENTS
At Baskin-Robbins®, we believe there’s always a reason to celebrate. Stay on top of our favorite events and holidays, or create and manage your own.
 
FIND A SHOP
Ice cream emergency? We get it. Finding the closest Baskin-Robbins® is always just a tap away. Speed up your pickup when you order ahead – future you will thank you.
 
BROWSE THE MENU

*Terms and conditions apply

The Ooni app - your ultimate pizza-making companion with a smart dough calculator and Ooni Connect™ Bluetooth connectivity!

Our smart pizza dough calculator takes the guesswork out of dough making. You can adjust settings for temperature, hydration, yeast type, and proofing time to dial in exactly what you’re looking for.

The app also includes hundreds of delicious recipes and cooking tips. Save your favourites and build your personal cookbook.

Plus, you can now connect the Ooni app to your oven with Ooni Connect™ via Bluetooth to monitor temperatures remotely in real time.

New to Ooni? Our step-by-step guides and resources help you get the hang of pizza-making techniques like stretching dough and launching pizzas into the oven. Our product guides can also help you take care of your oven and accessories.

If you have questions or feedback, contact apps@ooni.com.

The all new KFC Saudi Arabia App is the fastest way to order your favorite KFC fried chicken online. Ordering food online within a few clicks has never been so easy. Pick up the food or get it delivered at your doorstep, in just a few taps from the latest KFC online food ordering app!


At KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared good food and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favorite chicken available, right from the convenience of your home.


*Get started and order in minimum steps: 
 
1. Download the KFC KSA app,
2. Select a preferred mode of language,
3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu,
4. Add goodness to your cart,
5. Easy Log in to use saved addresses or continue as Guest,
6. Choose your preferred mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery,
7. Select location and provide a delivery address,
8. Hassle free proceed to check out and make payment,
9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery,
10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 

Why you should use KFC App:

Takeaway:
While you are out and about in the city, takeaway your delicious food from any nearest KFC KSA restaurant by ordering from the food delivery app.   

 Smart Car Hop:                                                                                                                                        Experience 100% Contactless and hassle-free Car Hop services. For our customers we bring the safest contactless delivery for your car parked in our premises.

Midnight delivery:
Bookmark our KFC KSA chicken restaurant for all the late-night cravings. Have a look at our KFC menu & we will rush to you with delicious burger meals even at midnight. This is available at select locations only.

My Account:
Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to login with ease.

Easy payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips, it is now hassle free to pay for your order.

Exclusive KFC Menu: 
Order from the wide range of - KFC bucket meals, Wraps, Zinger box meals, twister burgers, Combos for one or for sharing, chicken fillet sandwiches and much more. Do not forget to look for our crispy chicken strips and more options from our Sides & Desserts section. 

Amazing Offers: 
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that it leaves you wanting for more. Get special rewards on the KFC deals app with your order. 

Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 920021111 For more details, please log into https://www.saudi.kfc.me/en/home

This app is your companion to create the perfect pizza dough!

It contains several pizza dough recipes for you to start with.
You can also customize your own dough recipe, the way you like it, feel free to experiment!

When would you like to bake pizza?
Schedule a date/time and the app will let you know when to start as well as the different steps for your recipe.
Receive a notification at each step and keep an eye on the upcoming step thanks to a widget.

Looking for in-depth information about pizza dough? Check out our guide!

Let's 'dough' it!
